item.description:
Want to post a heads up for a few free events coming up - the first is a street fair tomorrow afternoon, another on June 18 (next Saturday). I will be there. Likely going to the others too.. of course anyone else wanting to grab one or more of these events is welcome to http://www.somervilleartscouncil.org/programs/artsunion/craft_market2011.htm

 

SOMERFUN FEST SATURDAY, JUNE 11th, 3-7pm (RD: SUN., JUNE 12th) Join us for our 2nd annual FREE street festival and market. With a variety of participating businesses, artisans, musicians and tons of games, demonstrations and activities.

 

BAZAAR BIZARRE SUNDAY, JUNE 19th, 12-6pm (RD: SUN., JUNE 26th) This outdoor event will also feature local DJs, interactive craft tutorials, activities and demonstrations.

 

BOSTON HANDMADE MARKETPLACE SATURDAY, JULY 30TH, 3-7pm (RD: SUN., JULY 31st) ArtsUnion continues the 2011 series with the Boston Handmade Marketplace in Union Square, Somerville. The outdoor market features work by Massachusetts artists, craftspeople, and artisans associated with the nonprofit arts organization Boston Handmade.

 

ROCK & ROLL YARD SALE SUNDAY, AUGUST 21st, 11-5pm (RD: SUN., AUGUST 28th) Once again, Rhode Island natives Chris and Jennifer Daltry will bring their unique brand of shopping to Union Square with the Somerville Rock & Roll Yard Sale. Based on the popular Providence series, the Daltry duo curates markets with a focus on vinyl records and music nostalgia
item.how_to_find_us: THIS IS STILL ON TODAY, Saturday. At 3pm, you can find me at Bloc 11, www.bloc11.com, 11 Bow Street a couple of blocks from the Square at about 3pm. Union Sq is easy to get to by bus - 87 from the stop by Dunkin in Davis Sq
item.name: Street-fair (sorta) free events coming up in Union Square, Somerville
